text: Carter Benedict Burwell (born November 18, 1954) is an American film composer. He has received Academy Awards nominations for Best Original Score for Carol (2015), Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017) and The Banshees of Inisherin (2022). == Early life == Burwell was born in New York City to Natalie Benedict and Charles Burwell. == Personal life == Burwell married Christine Sciulli in 1999 and had kids Tycho Burwell, Tor Burwell and Greta Burwell. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1954 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Carter Burwell
